channel.title: Projects on Chirag Chopra
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chirag Chopra

item.title: Project 2 : Stock-Price-Prediction
item.description: In this project, I trained a Ridge regression model and deep neural network model to predict future stock prices. The AI model will be trained using historical stock price data along with volume of transactions.

item.title: Project 1 : Asset_allocation
item.description: In this project, I performed portfolio analysis such as calculating returns, risks sharpe ratio. And also Link to Github repository
